nodes.description: 周二早晨，自杀式袭击者在吉尔吉斯斯坦首都比什凯克的中国大使馆 compound 内引爆
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber blew himself up inside the Chinese Embassy’s compound in Bishkek, the capital of Kyrgyzstan, on Tuesday morning, wounding three Kyrgyz staff members, according to local officials.

nodes.description: 袭击者驾驶 Mitsubishi Delica 车冲撞大使馆大门，车辆在进入 compound 约160英尺处爆炸
nodes.support_text: The attacker rammed the gates of the embassy with a Mitsubishi Delica that exploded about 160 feet into the compound.

nodes.description: 袭击者当场死亡，导致3名吉尔吉斯斯坦工作人员受伤
nodes.support_text: The driver died on the scene. 'This was a suicide bomber, three people got injured, they were hospitalized'

nodes.description: 副总理 Zhenish Razakov 向媒体确认袭击为自杀式爆炸，受伤人员已送医
nodes.support_text: Zhenish Razakov, the country’s deputy prime minister, told journalists in a video that was released by a local news website.

edges.support_text: wounding three Kyrgyz staff members, according to local officials.
The attacker rammed the gates of the embassy with a Mitsubishi Delica that exploded about 160 feet into the compound.
